name: Attack on Titan Anthology
summary:
Review
"One of the best comics anthologies of the year." -Comics Alliance

"Gorgeous, heartbreaking... Some of our favorite comics creators." -io9

"One of the most riveting titles I’ve read this year...an absolute delight." -Manga Bookshelf

"Great artistic efforts, poignant stories. Well worth a look." -Anime News Network

"A huge step forward for manga in this country... Nothing like this has ever been done." - Comics Beat

About the Author
Current talent list- Brenden Fletcher, Cameron Stewart & Babs Tarr (Batgirl) Tomer & Asaf Hanuka (The Divine, Bipolar) Faith Erin Hicks (Adventures of Superhero Girl, Friends with Boys) Kate Leth (Kate or Die, Vampirella) & Jeremy Lambert (Haven) Michael Avon Oeming (Powers) Afua Richardson (Genius) Paolo Rivera (Spider-Man, Mythos) Damion Scott (Web of Spider-Man) Gail Simone (Batgirl) Scott Snyder (Batman, American Vampire) Genevieve Valentine (Mechanique- A Tale of the Circus Tresaulti) Kevin Wada (She-Hulk) Ronald Wimberly (Prince of Cats)
info:
• 中文名: 进击的巨人漫画选集
  • 册数: 1
  • 出版社: Kodansha Comics、講談社
  • 原作: 諫山創
  • 价格: $29.99
  • 发售日: October 18, 2016
  • 页数: 256页
  • ISBN: ISBN-10: 1632362589 ISBN-13: 978-1632362582
  • 作者: by Scott Snyder (Author), Gail Simone (Author), Faith Erin Hicks (Author), Tomer Hanuka (Author), Hajime Isayama (Creator)
